Class Tab

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.gwtbootstrap.client.ui.Tab
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasIcon, HasStyle, IsResponsive, HasClickHandlers, HasHandlers, HasWidgets, IsWidget, Iterable<Widget>

    public class Tab
extends Object
implements IsWidget, HasWidgets, HasClickHandlers, HasStyle, IsResponsive, HasIcon
    The tab widget for TabPanel. It's for only UiBinder.
    Author:
    ohashi keisuke

      • setShowOn

        public void setShowOn(Device device)
        Description copied from interface: IsResponsive
        Sets the kind of device, this widget is shown on.

        The widget is not shown on any other device.

        Only works if responsive design is turned on!

        Specified by:

        See Also:
